summary: Models the full antenatal period of pregnancy, tracking each pregnancy from conception to delivery or loss, assessing risks of complications (e.g., abortion, anemia, hypertension, diabetes, placental issues, preterm labor, stillbirth), calculating careâ€‘seeking behavior, estimating health burden (DALYs), and updating the simulated population state accordingly.
business_intent: Enable realistic, probabilistic simulation of pregnancy outcomes and maternal health impacts for population health analysis, policy assessment, and resource planning.
